name: Treasure Isle - Jam Release
description:
Note: This version of the game is the jam release, since I wanted to change some things in the game after the initial upload, I created a new page for the game . If you wish to rate this game for the Mini Game Jam 50, please rate play this version. if you enjoyed it make sure to check the updated page here. 

You are about to retire, and have a ton of cash...

Where is the place to put it? On your own private island. too bad some pirates head you have some good treasure and they want if for themselves. 

Construct traps around the island to kill as many pirates as possible.

Programming and Art: Ron Horowitz

Music: Illy Rozen (Illy's Youtube Channel)
